title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not update immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the interface.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.
OB: When modifying the font size of the label, the label's height does not change.
EB: When modifying the font size of the label, the label's height should update to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label to the interface.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be 18 points and observe the height of the label.
